title: Handle a Cleaning Fee Request
description: A driver reports that a rider left a mess in their car and requests a cleaning fee.

tasks.description: The driver submits a cleaning fee request for a specific trip, including photos of the mess.
tasks.expected_outcome: The request and photos are received.

tasks.description: An agent reviews the photos to verify that the mess requires professional cleaning.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the mess is significant enough to warrant a fee.

tasks.description: Apply a standard cleaning fee to the rider's account for that trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rider is charged the cleaning fee.

tasks.description: Notify both the driver and the rider of the fee assessment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Both parties are informed of the outcome.
